markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 18"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Impossible Flurry](/Feats.aspx?ID=4907) <actions string="Three Actions" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Flourish" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=73" />
<trait label="Ranger" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=682" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Player Core](/Sources.aspx?ID=216) pg. 163 <sup>2.0</sup>

**Requirements**
You are wielding two melee weapons, each in a different hand

</column>

---

You forgo precision to attack at an impossible speed. Make three melee Strikes with each of the required weapons. Your first attack with each weapon takes the multiple attack penalty as though you had already made one attack this turn. All of the remaining Strikes take the maximum multiple attack penalty.
name: Impossible Flurry
requirement: You are wielding two melee weapons, each in a different hand
requirement_markdown: You are wielding two melee weapons, each in a different hand

All of the remaining Strikes take the maximum multiple attack penalty.
